trans-unit.source: Create an Operational Insights account and sign in
trans-unit.target: Create an Operational Insights account and sign in

trans-unit.source: Learn about how to create an Operational Insights account and then sign in
trans-unit.target: Learn about how to create an Operational Insights account and then sign in

trans-unit.source: Use the following information to set up an account to use with Microsoft Azure Operational Insights, and sign in to Operational Insights.
trans-unit.target: Use the following information to set up an account to use with Microsoft Azure Operational Insights, and sign in to Operational Insights.

trans-unit.source: If you want to create an Organizational account, sign up at <linkText>Microsoft Account For Organizations</linkText><title></title> . Then, you need to grant access to your Organizational account for Operational Insights in <linkText>Azure Active Directory</linkText><title></title>.
trans-unit.target: If you want to create an Organizational account, sign up at <linkText>Microsoft Account For Organizations</linkText><title></title> . Then, you need to grant access to your Organizational account for Operational Insights in <linkText>Azure Active Directory</linkText><title></title>.

trans-unit.source: If you want to get a Microsoft Account (previously called a “Windows Live ID”), sign up at <linkText>Sign Up – Microsoft Account</linkText><title></title>.
trans-unit.target: If you want to get a Microsoft Account (previously called a “Windows Live ID”), sign up at <linkText>Sign Up – Microsoft Account</linkText><title></title>.

trans-unit.source: Access is automatically granted to Operational Insights with a Microsoft account.
trans-unit.target: Access is automatically granted to Operational Insights with a Microsoft account.

trans-unit.source: Go to <linkText>Microsoft Azure Operational Insights</linkText><title></title> and choose Sign in at the top of the page.
trans-unit.target: Go to <linkText>Microsoft Azure Operational Insights</linkText><title></title> and choose Sign in at the top of the page.

trans-unit.source: Select Microsoft account or Organizational account and then sign in with your credentials.
trans-unit.target: Select Microsoft account or Organizational account and then sign in with your credentials.

trans-unit.source: Create an Operational Insights account to associate with your sign-in information.
trans-unit.target: Create an Operational Insights account to associate with your sign-in information.

trans-unit.source: To learn more about getting started with Operational Insights, see:
trans-unit.target: To learn more about getting started with Operational Insights, see:
